document.full_text: oil prices fell more than 1 percent on tuesday in choppy trading as weak economic data fueled concerns about demand that have contributed to crude's 15 percent decline so far in may.
document.title: oil falls on weak economic data, demand worries
lines_and_colors: oil prices fell more than 1 percent on tuesday in choppy trading as weak economic data fueled concerns about demand that have contributed to crude's 15 percent decline so far in may.
